creator: Michael_S_Smith@yahoo.com
text:
I attempted to deploy the sample soap programs using Tomcat 3.2.1 and soap 2.1, 
following instructions given in a recent JavaPro article. All deployments fail 
with the error "cannot resolve namespace ns2". The TcpTunnel snooper shows the 
program is looking for a resource at http://xml.apache.org/soap-xml which 
apparently does not or did not exist on 3/31/01. What gives?

                                                           Mike

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Very likely a Soap or parser problem, probably related with the parser. You
could try replacing crimson with xerces ( in 3.2 ) or include xerces in your WAR
( 3.3 ), and that make it work ( I have a feeling soap was tested with xerces, 
and tomcat includes crimson ).
